snippet: The Canadian company has posted an operating loss of $2.4 billion over the last five years.
abstract: US Steel Canada is granted creditor protection after posting operating loss of $2.4 billion over last five years; filing means Canadian unit's results will no longer be included in US Steel's financial statements.
lead_paragraph: The Canadian company has posted an operating loss of $2.4 billion over the last five years.

headline.main: U.S. Steel’s Canada Subsidiary Files for Creditor Protection
headline.print_headline: U.S. Steel’s Canada Subsidiary Files for Creditor Protection
